article: to fulfill its dreams of creating a financial services empire on the internet , merrill lynch & co. is teaming up with hsbc holdings to offer online banking and investment services throughout europe and asia , the two companies announced on tuesday .
abstract: merrill lynch and hsbc in joint venture
